pages.text: A $(bold)Good$(), also known as a commodity, is any valuable item worth buying and selling in a $(l:overview/commodity_markets)Commodity Market$().$(p)Almost anything can be considered a Good, but for the purposes of record-keeping (and taxation), the Tradewinds Consortium has created a categorization system which can be found in the $(l:goods)List of Goods$().

The price and availability of every Good is affected by $(l:overview/supply_and_demand)Supply and Demand$(). Knowing where to buy Goods cheaply and where to sell them for profit is an essential skill of any trader.
